examples.example: 当别人帮助了我，我都会真诚地说一声谢谢。

translate.english: When others help me, I will sincerely say thank you.

examples.example: 当我得到朋友的礼物时，我开心地说谢谢。

translate.english: When I got the gift from my friend, I happily said thank you.

examples.example: 别人为我指出错误时，我会微笑着说谢谢。

translate.english: When others point out my mistakes for me, I will smile and say thank you.
